content.about: 2 Antique Appraisers provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art. With Since ~2010 [3][6] experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Dallas area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jessica C.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Patricia M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Sarah W.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art. With Since ~2010 [3][6] experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

reviews.author: Jessica W.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Emily R.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Robert A.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: John M.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.
